product.name: Blair Hair Bow
product.description: If Blair Waldorf were a bride, we imagine she would be loving this bow. Made of soft tulle and covered in pearls, our Blair bow is where fun & flirty meets preppy. *Comes with a metal clip in the back for an easy, secure hold. Dimensions: 9' wide, 16' lon

product.name: Insanely Chic
product.description: With the comeback of many 90s trends, excessive accessorizing is the new normal. From cloud-like scrunchies to elegant pearl clips, you can give even the most basic hairstyle a fabulous twist.

product.name: Amy Crystal Bow
product.description: Our most popular Amy Bow gets an upgrade with a delicate scattering of hand-applied Swarovski crystal stones, serving up all the sparkly silky feels. Width:15 cm, Length: 30cm

product.name: Lavender dream
product.description: You know that lavender helps with stress, and besides it has a gorgeous color. You will feel like you are in the boundless fields of lavender in France when you wear it. Width: 12 cm, Length: 27 cm
